subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit How to run the same test with different data (how about Cactus)
msgSnippet: ... Agreed. Either change your design so that you can inject an HttpSession object in the required place, or use ServletUnit. I recommend both techniques in
messageBody:
Russell Gold wrote:
> On Fri, 29 Oct 2004 18:00:46 -0000, zoran_101 <zoran_101@...> wrote:

> > Thanks Joe, at least now I know for sure, however my test setup
> > requires me to have a valid session so I need to run my tests in
> > Cactus.
>
> Really? It seems to me that both ServletUnit and JUnitEE should work for
> you.

Agreed. Either change your design so that you can inject an HttpSession
object in the required place, or use ServletUnit. I recommend both
techniques in _JUnit Recipes_.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
